<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Called](/Feats.aspx?ID=1330) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Changeling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=212" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 31 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have heard the Call, and in constantly resisting that persistent demand, you've developed a mental bulwark against effects that would target your mind. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saving throws against [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effects. If you roll a success on your saving throw against a mental effect that would make you [controlled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=6), you get a critical success instead.
